pullRequest.title: Add timestampadd/timestampdiff function
pullRequest.bodyText:
1.Support timestampdiff function
2.Support timestampadd function
3.Add Doris keyword (YRAR,MONTH,WEEK,DAY,HOUR,MINUTE,SECOND)
4.Fix some cup format
#2703

nodes.bodyText: fn is {} name is {} thie log should be remove or change to debug level.  There will be a lot of this log from doris 0.11

commit.message:
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/timestampdiff' into timestampdiff

# Conflicts:
#	be/src/exprs/timestamp_functions.cpp
#	be/test/exprs/timestamp_functions_test.cpp

nodes.bodyText: should add this new keyword to keywords rule
